text:
Hi <@U07PDC3UHJ6>
If you are able to retrieve that information via API call you can just create multiple private app to increase the API rate limit and keep it running for 2-3 days. What is the range of contacts you have there?

Hi! I’m looking for advice on whether there’s a way to sync our website’s knowledge base with HubSpot’s knowledge base, either via API or other methods. Any help or suggestions would be greatly appreciated!

Thank you! :hugging_face:
